amendment.description: To increase funding for part B of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act by reducing spending on other government programs by a commensurate amount.

vote.text: Amendment SA 377 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 10. Record Vote Number: 71.

action.text: Amendment SA 377 proposed by Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S4236-4237; text: CR S4236-4237) To increase funding for part B of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act by reducing spending on other government programs by a commensurate amount.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 377 proposed by Senator Gregg.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 377 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 10. Record Vote Number: 71.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 377 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 10. Record Vote Number: 71.
